item.title: List of talks
item.description: Past oral presentations: Langton, S. & Adepeju, M. 2018. A longitudinal study of offender residential concentration in the UK. Presented at the European Society of Criminology - Sarajevo, BiH - 29th August 2018. Adepeju, M. 2017 Developing a hybrid hotspot approach for improving the accuracy of crime prediction. ECTQG 18th European Colloquium on Theoretical and Quantitative Geography, York, United Kingdom, September 2017 Adepeju, M. & Cheng, T. 2016 A Spatially-Integrated Sparse Point Time Series (SSPT) Prediction Method.
